wikipedia_page.main: Charles Roger Macpherson Notcutt  (30 May 1934 – 1 July 2015) was a horticulturalist and businessman. The Scotsman, in its obituary, said that Notcutt was "an inspirational and popular leader of the horticultural community, establishing and developing many trade bodies, as well as education and research in the field."

response: *Charles Notcutt, 81, British horticulturalist.Appreciation: Charles Notcutt OBE, horticulturalist
